entry.title: Hello PittCSS!
entry.content: We launch the PITT Initiative on the Computational Social Science to connect to everyone who are interested in doing CSS research.
entry.summary: We launch the PITT Initiative on the Computational Social Science to connect to everyone who are interested in doing CSS research.
